_rawTooltip.fullTooltip:
Innate: Kled rides his semi-trusty mount, Skaarl. While Mounted, all damage dealt to the duo is suffered by Skaarl, who has [[1]] [[2]][[3]] effects consider Kled & Skaarl's combined maximum health.
Being reduced to [[4]] causes Skaarl to flee, forcing Kled to be Dismounted, with all damage in excess of Skaarl's health being ignored. Upon dismounting, Kled dashes toward his nexus for 0.75 seconds, though not through terrain, cleanses himself of all crowd control and becomes unable to act, untargetable, and immune to crowd control for 0.5 seconds, during which he also reduces all incoming damage received by 100%.
While Kled is Dismounted, his base health and base movement speed are reduced (-40), his base attack range is increased, Bear Trap on a Rope is replaced with Pocket Pistol, and Jousting and Chaaaaaaaarge!!! become unusable. Dismounted Kled gains 1% bonus HP as Armor and Magic Resist, increased by 20% for each nearby enemy champ (up to 2% bonus HP).
Innate: Kled is only vulnerable to death while Dismounted. Kled has [[5]], which is not improved by sources of bonus health, as well as reduced base movement speed and increased attack range. Percent-health effects consider Kled & Skaarl's combined maximum health, meaning that a Dismounted Kled is always considered to be low health.
Kled gains [[7]] when moving towards visible enemy champions within 1200 units, but his basic attacks against them deal [[0]] (at levels 1/6/11/16). Additionally, he gains the ability to restore Skaarl's Courage to reunite again.
Innate - Courage: Kled gains 15 Courage when basic attacking an enemy champion, 5 Courage for minion kills, and 5 Courage when basic attacking a structure or epic monster. At 100 Courage, Skaarl returns with [[6]] and Kled becomes Mounted after 0.7 seconds. Mounting up resets the cooldowns of Bear Trap on a Rope and Jousting.
While at the allied fountain, 25 Courage is generated every 0.25 seconds. Recalling fully restores Skaarl's Courage and health. If reuniting outside of base, Skaarl gets Frayed Nerves, which prevents him from gaining Courage for 30 seconds.
The current status of Kled's own health is preserved between subsequent dismounts. While Mounted, healing will first affect Skaarl's health and will only restore Kled's health while Skaarl is at full health.

[[0]] Kled throws a bear trap that deals [[1]] and hooks onto the first enemy champion or large jungle monster hit.

If Kled stays near a hooked enemy for 1.75 seconds, he yanks out the trap, dealing [[2]], [[3]] them and [[4]] by 30/35/40/45/50% for 2.5 seconds.

[[0]] Every 4 seconds, Kled's next Attack grants [[1]] for four Attacks or 4 seconds.

The fourth hit deals an additional [[2]].

Kled dashes, dealing [[0]] to enemies he passes through.

If this Ability hits an enemy champion or large jungle monster, Kled gains [[1]] for 1 second and can [[2]] within 3 seconds to dash back through the same target.

Kled charges toward an area, leaving a trail that grants allies increasing [[0]]. While charging and for 2 seconds after Kled gains up to [[1]]. Skaarl rams the first enemy champion encountered, dealing up to [[2]] (based on distance travelled) and briefly [[3]].

Change.After: 400-1550 (based on level)

Change.Attribute: ALL YOUR BASE HEALTH ARE BELONG TO KLED:
Change.After: Skaarl's base health now counts towards Kled's base health, not Kled's bonus health

Change.Attribute: ALL YOUR BONUS HEALTH ARE BELONG TO SKAARL:
Change.After: Any health items that Kled purchases will add to Skaarl's health and count as bonus health
While unmounted, Kled will check whether Skaarl's Courage has been restored twice as often, reducing the time it takes for them to reunite when at max Courage
Kled now spawns with full health

Change.After: Attacking enemies while Violent Tendencies is on cooldown now reduces the remaining cooldown. 1.5 second reduction for champion attacks, 0.5 second reduction for non-champions.
No longer starts the W sequence when attacking wards. Instead, attacking wards matches plant behavior and maintains the attack speed without consuming W.
Now has a HUD tracker to indicate how long you will have to recast E2
Now has a range indicator while E2 is active
